website_summaries.verdict: Versatile, good-looking design that falls on the lower end of the price scale. Nice for small spaces, but comes with some quality concerns.
pros: Combines the look of wood with metal legs
Two-tiered design with back makes it ideal for lamps, books, remotes, and more
cons: Components with pre-drilled holes that don't line up are common
20.5-inch height won't work for all areas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: It's more like a compressed particle board, but after putting it together (which was pretty easy) it looks so cute! I love it for an inexpensive end table.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Small but actually sits next to my bed at just the right height. Assembly wasn't complicated at all but did take time as assembly always does. the only problem I ran into was with the wooden pegs since, as I've always found with them, if they are not shoved in alllll the way they can cause the boards to not line up quite right so you really have to jam it in (manually-no tools or you will destroy the board). Also important to not twist in the cam locks in the order depicted in the instructions. I was worried but all my sides lined up neatly with no gaps! Totally worth the price, super happy.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Needed end tables for my 3 season room but didn’t want to spend a fortune. These are beautiful. Solid. Don’t look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Eazor

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely next to a low profile platform bed
customer_reviews.text: Good little table! Putting it together felt kind of cheaply made - I was worried about cracking the wood as I tightened the screws and rotated the hidden cams. It was a little awkward putting this lil' guy together, but it fits nicely next to my low profile platform bed. The vintage industrial look compliments my style.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Finley

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money on these!
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money! They look great as for as wood finish, except bolts dont line up correctly l, dry difficult to assemble and leaves gaps on sides no matter what you do. Purchased two of them and after assembling 1st one, I thought the 2nd one would be easier, but I was wrong! Was better off purchasing something already assembled in person rather than wasting money on these tables. If they weren’t assembled as best as I could, I would be returning them quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good looking excellent nigthstands
customer_reviews.text: Very Fine piece of furniture. It looks nice, the instructions are super clear and it’s incredibly easy and fast to assemble. I bought 2, they look very good, quality is amazing. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Kindle

customer_reviews.title: I like this table very sturdy and the stackable option is ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this table very sturdy and the stackable option is also nice.. wish there was a 4.5 star option. For such a simple looking piece of furniture there was A LOT of assembly. That being said, the instructions were very clear!
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid S.

customer_reviews.title: Assemble Problems
customer_reviews.text: Assemble is straight forward if you have the correct pieces. I had the table about 2/3 assembled when I discovered that I had a wrong piece. I contacted the seller and they promptly sent me the correct piece. The tools sent for assemble are useless. If the screws are not tight there will be gaps. I used my a multi-bit screw driver which made assemble simple and the screws tight. The table is what we wanted. Besides the assemble problems, we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Nope, not worth the money paid.
customer_reviews.text: If you have an aversion to cam locks, stay away from this item. It has 16 of them. Two of mine were stripped and two other holes weren't completely cut out so I had to whittle them out. Noticed after assembling (took an hour) that the item is damaged, which is evident it happened during manufacture. Not worth the hassle of disassembling, repacking and returning. If it lasts a month, I'll be surprised. I should have saved my money for something else.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Edit: was sent a new
customer_reviews.text: Would be a great little table if you could actually get it to fit together tightly at the edges etc. HUGE gaps . I’ve put a lot of furniture together in my time and this is by far the worst most frustrating item to assemble. Left with a table I can’t use Edit: the company reached out and sent me a new one. It was a little easier to put together ... I still had to manhandle the last bit to get it to fit together tightly at the seams but this one was much better!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Preciado

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected, but super happy with end product
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant to buy these due to the reviews about how hard they were to assemble, as well as them not fitting well together when assembling them. I have to completely disagree. They definitely took a little time to assemble, but everything fit just the way it was supposed to. I understand what people meant about them not fitting perfectly together. They just need a little extra push (mallet or hammer with a towel barrier) to knock the pieces into place, but once they fit, they fit perfectly. Don't tighten the screws until they're in place!! Love them, but sadly smaller than expected based on pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for a small bed...
customer_reviews.text: I had the same issues that other reviewers had--one side did NOT want to close completely and it took a lot of pounding and pushing from a very strong person to finally get the gap closed. That was manageable because I have a very strong person at home, but my biggest surprise is how short it is. Yes, dimensions are listed. But for our bed, with a box spring and mattress, the night stand was a good 18 inches minimum lower than the top of the bed. It looked like a dollhouse table and was not practical so I am using it beside a couch. Just make sure you check the height against your bed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Those are very nice looking nightstands!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was scared while ordering cause a lot of people showed their images with some broken or unmatching pieces. Fortunately, I have a very good experience. I think you need to be careful during the assemble to not mix up the left and right side, but otherwise, everything looks great. The hight is just right for my bed. I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Aneta

customer_reviews.title: Good value, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a smaller nightstand after putting my bed on the floor since my dog can’t get up and down with the frame anymore. Finally got around to buying a smaller table and I love it. It’s perfect for what I needed it for. Alignment was a little tight for a couple screws but not a big deal. Be careful to read the dimensions, people saying it’s too small obviously didn’t measure it out before they bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie H

customer_reviews.title: A major disappointment and absolute waste of money
customer_reviews.text: holes don't line up. big gaps at the joints. following the picture ended up with all of the flat head screws facing outward when one would expect them to face inwardly. A major disappointment and absolute waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: M Liu

customer_reviews.title: Looks great for price
customer_reviews.text: Not one to buy much furniture u need to assemble, but this piece was cheap and perfect size. It's pretty much an Ikea piece, took under 30 mins to assemble. Since its small and compact its really sturdy for its need. It did have a nice size scratch on back so a little disappointing. I can live with it on the back and for the price though. I really like the design and the veneer has a great rustic wood look. Whole piece has a rustic industrial look and looks fairly good up close. Priced right for this type of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Beeeee

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough looking, but poor quality particle board.
customer_reviews.text: If you're careful putting these together, they are cool looking. Just know that they are made with VERY cheap particle board. It's almost like they didn't use enough glue in the process of making the material. While putting one of the dowels in I pushed it straight through the other side, using just my thumb. It knocked out a big piece of laminate and I noticed how flaky and soft the material was. We ended up just taking it apart and sending it back because I couldn't fix the hole. Again, if you're careful, and you really like the look, it's fine. Just know what you're getting is very cheaply made. For the quality, they're overpriced in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in nursery
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small table next to my rocking chair and its perfect. Now that I'm past the newborn stage it's still super useful. My son loves to stand there and stack his books on it. Perfect height for next to a chair and love the little nook. This was WAY better made than what I expected and most of the furniture I got from bigger retailers where the wood is poorly glued on top and peels off. This hasn't chipped or peeled or anything and I don't see that happening any time soon. Great product. First time buying furniture off of Amazon and I was happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Marian T Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Very good looking nightstand, but one small problem.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the look of this nightstand, and the assembly was very easy. The only issue was that it was missing one of the screws. It's weird, because they included a spare for literally every other small component, but somehow they shorted me one screw. It's still nice and sturdy, so no big deal, just a bit awkward upon closer inspection since the screws are very visible on the side of the product.
customer_reviews.author: 1992bc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price. Perfect match for our guest bedroom set. Very easy to put together (very good instructions) and sturdy. Would buy from Songmics again. Saw some reviewers complain about the size, the product description is spot on. If this size will suit you, then you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: bernard allulli

customer_reviews.title: Great industrial vibe
customer_reviews.text: These tables are the shortest ones I’ve ever bought, but yet they work well. I put two of these together by myself in a little less than an hour. I didn’t have to dig around for my screw driver because they came with the Allen wrenches needed. After putting the nightstands together, they feel plenty sturdy and look like they’re made with real wood as long as you don’t touch them lol. They help give my bedroom the rustic industrial look that I’m going for.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a telephone stand with a ridge since my cat knocked the phone onto the floor. This stand is attractive and sturdy. The pieces went together perfectly. They even provide extra bolts/dowel to make sure none are missing. From the time I opened the package, checked to make sure all parts were there and assembled the stand, it only took about an hour. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ZooPlace

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value for the money. Quick assembly of sturdy units. I purchased to stack and use as a nightstand. You can’t tell they are stacked, if you didn’t know it. They are the perfect height. I bought a third one to use as a stand alone with a futon. It is short, but perfect for that room and decor. Sleek style makes this easy to blen with any decor. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you're patient
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together if you **take your time** and make sure you have your pieces oriented right. I almost didn't buy this end table due to reviews mentioning missing holes/stuff not fitting together and I sincerely got worried a couple of times but I'm convinced those problems *mostly* (not all) reflect user error. Table works perfectly for a low couch and I'm very pleased with the overall quality for the price. The piece looks gorgeous even though it's just particle board. I can't complain!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Pinkham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service, Nicely designed products
customer_reviews.text: After writing a review about a problem with assembly, SONGMICs customer service sent out a brand new piece to replaced the damaged one--which assembled perfectly. The tables look great, and more importantly--this company stands behind its product and has EXCELLENT customer service/response. I would buy again from them in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Panno

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the worst table ever. Not only did it take me over an hour to put together its SO small. It looks like something my daughter would use for her dolls. Do yourself a favor and find a different table. Anything that uses pegs to put together is never worth buying. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: nkmoyer1

customer_reviews.title: Small so stack them
customer_reviews.text: Let me first say that one of these on their own is way to small for most beds. I ended up buying 4 and stacking them. Other than the size i really like them. Like i said i bought 4 and there were no issues with any of them. They look great with my new bed set.
customer_reviews.author: Remmick

customer_reviews.title: Issues were addressed and I am very happy
customer_reviews.text: Update: i had initially received an incomplete product but the seller responded back quickly and fixed the issues. I've always valued a response to a mistake more than the inconvenience of it and I am happy eith how my case was addressed. Would buy from this vendor again 110% When I assembled the product I could not complete the last step. The pieces of the table are not correct and do not fit. The dimensions of the middle parts are not correct and do not align with the manual at all with the size.
customer_reviews.author: Maaseru

customer_reviews.title: Great addition!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together. I love the look. It fits a lot in the bottom and I bought two small baskets to put stuff in. It's easy to clean and has enough clearance from the floor to the bottom to put a gallon water under it for my diffuser. It's light so if I need to turn it towards me that isn't a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: The best bang for your buck! I was hesitant because reviews said difficult to assemble, took me literally 15 minutes to put it together and was incredibly easy and simple. I bought two because I wasn’t sure they would be too short since my bed is very high and I saw that you can stack them. They look so great stacked! Looks better in person too
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Small, inexpensive, well planned kit.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble! The pieces matched the parts list in the instructions. The only tools needed are the included hex wrenches. The predrilled holes lined up. There were a few spare screws. It was a great beginner project for my daughter and I. I could have assembled it solo in about twenty minutes. The aged wood look was nicely done. The only lower-quality aspect is the particle-board. I suspect it will last a long long time in our house, but there are definitely limits to the wear and tear particle-board can tolerate. This was spelled out in the item information, so I expected it.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Cool, unique design.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised with this. Very unique and classy while also being useful. I’m used to nightstands with a drawer but I actually really like how this one is open. More of a shelf. It’s masculine for my style but I really like the industrial look. It is short! So my bed is on a platform but it’s not high at all and this seems very low compared to other end table/nightstands I’ve had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Adams

customer_reviews.title: Cheap with broken/missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: Overall... it’s fine. Definitely low quality particle board, but looks nice at a distance. A lot of the screws needed for assembly came warped out of the bag and were unusable, which means it is missing some screws on the side. If it wasn’t such a hassle to dissemble and return, I probably would.
customer_reviews.author: Mindingpsych

customer_reviews.title: Great value and style. Edges don’t meet completely
customer_reviews.text: These look great and were a great value aside from an issue other people have mentioned. The seams don’t meet completely along the edges. It drives me crazy when I see it up close but it’s barely noticeable at a distance. They are however extremely sturdy. I’m pretty sure I could jump on them. And the style is great. It would look like something much more expensive if it wasn’t for the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the cost and design. Please note these are SMALL. I don’t mind the small design but they do look a little strange next to a king size bed. However I don’t care because I like them anyways. Very sturdy and easy to assemble. FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS AND PAY ATTENTION. Easy to get confused if you aren’t paying attention... I can assure you some bad reviews are not the fault of the product. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little table. I purchased it for “mini” sessions for photography and not for use in the home. It was easy to put together and is very sturdy. The directions kind of suck, but it’s sort of easy to figure out. Took me about 20min solo to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect side table!
customer_reviews.text: What a great little side table! This went between two chairs in my family room. It’s small but perfect to go between chairs and still hold drinks and a small lamp. It looks nice and was so easy to assemble. Bought this table in a lightning deal but would absolutely pay the full price for this table if I needed another one. If you need this table look no further.
customer_reviews.author: RetailTherapy

customer_reviews.title: Last screw will not thread in to complete
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this in to complete my daughters room for her Christmas this year. Got all the pieces together and the very last screw will not thread in due to a manufacturing defect. I cannot finish putting it together and now have to take apart to ship back. I’m super upset because we both really loved this product and I was planing on adding more pieces from the line to her room and my sons. We live over an hour away from any town that has furniture so I was stocked when we fell in love with something online. Shipping was super fast and product is beautiful, just can’t finish it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Allen

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking table, as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This is a great side table/end table. It looks exactly as pictured. The package came with everything that I needed to put it together. The only thing that was a little confusing is that the instructions are all in pictures. The only thing I might add is "front" or "back" to give an indication about what might be the front of the item after assembled.
customer_reviews.author: a person

customer_reviews.title: Defective pre-drilled holes
customer_reviews.text: We were super excited to get this table to use in our living room. Upon assembly we learned one of the legs was defective. The pre-drilled holes in the metal leg were not big enough for the screws they provided to screw into. Unfortunately my husband thought he could fix it by making the hole bigger but had no luck. We assembled all other parts, which was very easy and followed the instructions well. But due to a defective leg and a husband that thought he could fix it, we cannot use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these nightstands! Great for the money and easy to put together. I had a toddler trying to "help" and still managed to put everything together without any issues. Keep in mind, these are NOT tall stands. I needed short ones because of my low bed height Nd these worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Cherepinsky

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy assembly! Looks like RH or C&B
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this bedside table. It looks far more expensive, like something from Crate and Barrel or Restoration Hardware. It was very easy to put together (less than 20mins). It was a great piece when I have some other wood in the room that’s always difficult to match.
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, unique, and adorable table!
customer_reviews.text: This little table is exactly how it described. It is quality made. I have it next to my computer desk and I set my filing organizer on it plus I store other items on the shelf. Really happy with it. My home is decorated with rustic tones and this blends end perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Lots of good storage for a bed side table
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these and stacked them for my wife. She wanted a little more height and some wheels so I removed the feet from the bottom one, cut a shelf for it to sit on and used the feet to attach the shelf. Screwed 4 wheels to the bottom of the shelf and she was good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Fagan

customer_reviews.title: Cute little side table
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of this table,,,,, and all was well until I got to the place where the pre-drilled holes for one of the legs were out of line! I finally got it together,,, but one leg is shorter than the others so it wobbles..... Still a pretty good deal for the price.....
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Smaller night stands if you dont want bulky
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I expected....but they work and are cute. Our bed is just really tall so I could have used them to have a little more height. They were easy to put together and are sturdy. Found these baskets that were perfect size for the opening and am using them as a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wayyyyy to small to be used as a nightstand unless you are a child.
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as a nightstand. It is barely taller than my briefcase and much to small to be of any use as a nightstand. Especially for the price. I have no idea what on earth it is supposed to be used for but it was a waste of money. Too much of a hassle to return .
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Anderson-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good if you get the right parts in the box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and the first one was perfect. Easy to put together and very cool design. The second arrived with a duplicate part (A1) and no A2 part that was supposed to be in the box. I've tried contacting the company with no results and Amazon will only refund me if I rebox and return the item but all I need is the correct part.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It took about 20 mins to assemble. Instructions are incredibly easy to follow! I like the height of them. I saw a lot of reviews saying they’re too short but I think they’re fine. I have an average height bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: This is so pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it looks, it is functional and perfect. Careful putting it together, one of the dowels got stuck and went through the other side. One of the two I bought had issues lining the dowels up. I am using these in my office and I love them, I have thought about getting them for my bedroom too.
customer_reviews.author: laq

customer_reviews.title: Simple to assemble and seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We did not have any trouble assembling this as others seem to have had. My husband and I are not “handy” people, and we took her time and followed the instructions, which were also very simple to follow. No problems at all. Nice little piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Chesmore

customer_reviews.title: Modern and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was wavering bc if the height of these, but I purchased them and I’m so glad I did. These are modern and very sturdy. They’re a couple inches shorter than most nightstands, so if you have a box spring and a mattress, they will sit below the mattress line, which is fine for me bc they look amazing in my bedroom. Assembly only took about 15 mins for each one and instructions were very easy to read. And, they’re a great deal! I got them for $50 each with free shipping. If you like the way they look, get them. they’re worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Legs weren’t level on the 2 tables I bought
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one back in February I think and the leg was a little off even tho everything was a screwed in correctly, so I just shoved some coasters under it. I bought a second one recently so it matches, I just put it together and the leg is even more off than the first one I bought! It’s easily fixed with coasters to balance it, and when they’re there it’s leveled and balanced; just upsetting that even though everything is screwed in correctly the legs are wonky both times I bought
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: This looks really nice and was relatively easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This looks really nice and was relatively easy to put together. I did it by myself in about 30 minutes. I did have some trouble getting one side to fit flush, but a hammer and a stack of paper solved that pretty easy. That is the only reason for the 4 stars. This looks way more expensive than it was and fits my industrial style living room.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great little table
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this table to sit my Karaoke machine on next to my TV. It is the perfect size and looks nice. It Is made very well and is very sturdy. I would definitely recommend this product. The table was also packaged very well. It was delivered to the wrong address and sat 2 days in the rain. When I finally received it nothing was damaged!
customer_reviews.author: ess west

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble, nice looking night stand
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a night stand. I love how it looks and while it was shorter than expected I have no problem with it. I really disliked the building process. It took a very long time and I had problems throughout it. I wish there was a video to help. Some how I messed up in a step and now if I move my night stand there is a gap on the side. The sides can be pushed back together to close it but it’s annoying. I could probably rebuild it but it’s a waste of time. Other than that I really like the vintage wood look and the black bars.
customer_reviews.author: Moncerat Politron

customer_reviews.title: Really great for nightlights!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for nightstand. But assembling is a bit pain in the ass, part of it is because woods will bend once you apply force to it, which makes assembling it a bit tricky. But it comes with all the tools you need, so no need to buy any additional screwdriver. For this I give a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This night stand was PERFECT! I was looking for something kind of rustic and went all around town and online browsing for the perfect piece. I'm so glad I chose this one. It's the perfect height for a platform bed. It is sturdy and easy to assemble. Couldn't have found a better piece for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ebug

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with it. It’s solid/heavy/sturdy. It doesn’t look cheap at all. The assembly is so easy, my 12yo daughter assembled it for me. With the discount, definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Solid Build
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking and serve their purpose. Make sure and measure next to your bed what the right height needs to be for easy reaching for your glasses or water next to your bed. These are a little shorter than we planned but they still get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Justin TEXAS

customer_reviews.title: WAAAYYY  TOOO  SHORT!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me? This nightstand is so small, so short, that I can't figure out how it will ever be useful. Was it made to be a nightstand for an army cot or maybe a bed from the 1950's? How could you even produce such a ridiculous item? My grandson purchased the item and assembled it as a gift for me but the two of us were extremely disappointed in its size. Seems like this company does not have standards or even common sense and is only interested in being cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a pain to put together, but love them. Have one on each side of my bed. Unfortunately, my cat has claimed these as her own.
customer_reviews.author: Nina A

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these to use as nightstands. They far exceeded my expectations! I was so impressed that even though they are small, they hold a lot of stuff (I am an avid reader and it fit a lot of books). They were very sturdy and easy to put together. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you suck at building things just buy this and save yourself the hassle.
customer_reviews.text: I'm honestly shocked at how easy this was to build and how nice it is. I read all these reviews saying how simple and stylish the piece was but I'm always that person that worries my package will happen to be the ONE that's damaged or missing a screw or something that would make it 10x more of a pain in the butt to build. This took me maybe 30 minutes tops and it looks amazing. Plenty of room and sits evenly. Honestly tempted to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy nightstand. I was just looking for something simple at a low cost for our guest room.easy assembly. The only thing I would say is definitely read the dimensions. For the first time I did not do that and it does sit a little lower than most night stands. This is not real wood of course but looks very nice. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Industrial Rustic side table adds charm at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: It's not solid wood, but who cares. This was an affordable buy for my teen son's room and perfect for the look he wanted. Easy enough to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bell-Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Super short-Not for adult use
customer_reviews.text: Product looked very trendy so I bought. Sadly it’s super small and very, very short. Not at all the size to put next to or to be used by the typical adult and their bed. Would do great maybe for a 3 year old. It’s so short...
customer_reviews.author: Tz Pendleton

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t completely stay together
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a nightstand for a small bedroom. It offers decent storage for the size, and the wood seems solid. I left a glass of perspiring water on it over night and the next day the water swiped right off, it did not absorb so it might have a pretty good finish. The only downside is that the sides keep coming detached from the middle. Not so much that it collapses, but enough to notice a very visible gap between the two pieces. No matter how many times I push the two pieces back together, it still comes apart within a matter of minutes. Must be a flaw in the manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this table. It was a little complicated to put together but I was proud and satisfied when I was finished. It has a finish on the wood that protects it from water rings and the interior fits my little basket from Target to hold all my bedside table things. It looks beautiful in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Glasner

customer_reviews.title: My 12 year old put it together in about 15 minutes.  Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: My son has a very low bed and this side table is just the right height for that. It is nicer than we had expected. Very sturdy metal legs. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid Nightstand
customer_reviews.text: The nightstand was easy to assemble. Just make sure to finish the outside screws until the very end. Everything fits together very securely. It's a small nightstand that takes up very little space. I would purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The last screw hole on each stand didn’t line up exactly so I used a drill to make a small pilot hole and it worked out. Overall good value and they look great. One small part of the veneer is loose but it’s not very noticeable fortunately.
customer_reviews.author: I Bought It

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful night stands
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing purchase for the price. I can’t go anywhere in the Bay Area and find new tables that look this pretty for the price. They go great with my bedroom set. The only flaw I saw was one of the tables legs was wobbly I had to unscrew one of the table ends so it could stand nice and sturdy. Other than that it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Nice, easy assembly, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put in my entry room with 2 chairs. It was easy to assemble, sturdy, just what I expected. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Side Table
customer_reviews.text: I brought this side table for my bedroom. I have a little sitting area with a chair and this table fits perfectly next to my chair. Love the storage area where I can put my books and other small items. Very well made, great price and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Janice H. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Just fine
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I needed something to use until I could find what I really want. They are easy enough to assemble and sturdy enough for the time being. They do not appear super durable for the long haul but good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sfay

customer_reviews.title: Good. Strong. Table.
customer_reviews.text: The table is of great quality. It is sturdy and fits well almost anywhere. It is a little pricey but worth it because you can stack them on top of one another and it looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cory K.

customer_reviews.title: Looked better in photo
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that I spent $50 on this table... I like the metal, but the "wood look" product really looks cheap. The table is very small, smaller than advertised. It also came with every single piece to be assembled plus a lot of dowels and screws, time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: nursecarter

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like how it looks. I mean no one is going to think you got this from a custom wood shop, but it's pretty good for what it is. Easy to assemble too. Liked it enough, I bought another for the other side of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Craig fisher

customer_reviews.title: Simple design and sturdy stand
customer_reviews.text: Simple, beautiful stand! Perfect for the use needed to hold sewing machine when not in use. I placed a nice basket in the bottom shelf to store thread and supplies. This piece of furniture matches well with living room decor.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I'll give it 5 stars to offset the idiot who gave it a low score because they couldn't figure out how to put it together. It's like an IKEA kit (better looking) with bad instructions. Guys don't read instructions, women do. Look at the parts, figure it out, it isn't hard.
customer_reviews.author: Average Guy

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware,  no two are alike
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these tables, the first was was perfect, everything you could hope for. The second? Not so much. The holes were lazily drilled in so the table ended up crooked and there was a large slash in the outside facing wood.
customer_reviews.author: John Kenneth Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: beautiful table exact as picture shown
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, easy to assembled, wood finish beautiful color and wood stain make it look expensive and yet VERY AFFORDABLE price. I had to change PART but they help me resolved issue professionally. I'm very happy with my purchase and their customer support on amazon and on facebook.
customer_reviews.author: Nanlika W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, attractive and very utilitarian.
customer_reviews.text: The unit was much easier to assemble than others I have put together - and it looks nice and works very well as a bedroom night table.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Compton

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE GOD DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This nightstand is horrific at best. Putting it together is like trying to catch a pig who has been rolled in baby oil. IT'S IMPOSSIBLE, and I'm not someone who has problems building furniture. And, once you finally get it put together, don't place anything over about 2lbs on it because it will fall to the ground in pieces. SO BAD.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but short measure first
customer_reviews.text: It's a but shorter than I'd have wanted but that's my fault for not measuring. It's still the perfect height for our low bed. Make sure you put the peices facing the right way! I did one piece upside-down and had to take it all apart and start over because it was the table top.
customer_reviews.author: This one

customer_reviews.title: Works many places
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would use this as a night stand ended up drilling a whole in the back and using it for my DVRnear the wall mounted tv. Works great may order another down the line as an actual night stand.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Barsic

customer_reviews.title: One leg was not threaded to accept screw-in footer.
customer_reviews.text: One foot of the legs was untapped for the threaded rubber footer. So I made a makeshift rubber pad for that leg. We bought two for stacking so I put that one on top. I'm disappointed as we may want to separate the two and then both the appearance and function of the faulty leg will be apparent. One of the two we purchased was as expected with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kramth

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Wife needed something to set next to her piano to hold music books. This fits the bill. Quality is good and wife is happy.
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It took less than 15 minutes to fully assemble. All holes lined up appropriately. It seems sturdy, but of course, time will tell on that. Overall very pleased with both the look and construction.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Morgan

customer_reviews.title: It looks like real wood.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it look likes real wood. It is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Zobo_303

customer_reviews.title: Great nightstand!
customer_reviews.text: I think it looks good. The only thing I wasn’t happy about was that the trim was cut short and you can see part of the particle board showing. Not super obvious but sometime I noticed and could be fixed. Other than that I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. It was easy to assemble (I’m a female) and looks nice next to my bed. The only issue is that it came out wobbly, and I don’t think it was something to do with my furniture assembly skills. I put a piece of thick carton under one of the legs and it helped.
customer_reviews.author: Nastia

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much exactly as advertised. It’s a little small but I knew it would be because I read the dimensions before ordering. Great little table. Stacking it adds shelving but not much height.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice.
customer_reviews.text: It took about 30 minutes to put together. It’s sturdy , functional , and visually appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.

customer_reviews.title: Updated review****
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product however holes didn’t align and I couldn’t place the second side on. It was looking good but can’t complwtey assemble due to misalignment. Otherwise would have been a great find Initially complained due to being frustrated with failed product. The buyer contacted me and sent me a replacement free of change. Super easy to put together and fits great this time. Love, love, love! It is small like reviews stated, however works perfect for my little space.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I just recently bought our first home and were looking for pretty much everything. We bought one of these for our bedroom and loved it so much that we bought two more. I wish it was just slightly taller.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Robbins-Musser

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together!  Nice nightstand!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. While it is pressboard, it is very well made. Easy to put together. Love when the tools are supplied! I am using it as a nightstand, next to bed. It’s nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Burden

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this as a side table for my video game area. Super cute, but you can absolutely not set anything that will moisten the top layer on or you'll ruin the surface. So easy to assemble that even my blind mother was able to help me put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Small but functional
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Nice little side table for my college student's first apartment.
customer_reviews.author: rarejule

product_meta.title: VASAGLE ALINRU Nightstand, Stackable End Table, Side Table for Small Spaces, Storage Compartment, Industrial Accent Furniture, Steel Frame, Rustic Brown and Black ULET54X
product_meta.description:
Color:Rustic Brown + BlackSpecifications: 
- Color: Rustic Brown, Black
- Material: Particleboard, Metal 
- Product Size: 16.5”L x 13.7”W x 20.5”H (42 x 35 x 52 cm) 
- Inner Size of Open Compartment: 15.4”L x 13.2”W x 7.1”H (39 x 33.5 x 18 cm) 
- Net Weight: 17.6 lb (8 kg)
- Gross Weight: 19.36 lb (8.8 kg)

Package Contents: 
- 1 x Side Table 
- 1 x Instructions 
- 1 x Assembly Tool

VASAGLE Notes: 
- Avoid exposure to direct sunlight and damp area. Keep the product away from sharp objects.
feature_bullets: SOMETHING CERTAIN: Some furniture looks good, but isn’t very practical. Others are functional, but look cold and boring. However, this side table has greige wood tones and a spacious open compartment, giving you the best of both worlds

PERFECT DESIGN: The sturdy, matte-black steel legs and robust shelving with a greige look make this striking nightstand stand out; it has individual character, remarkable durability, and an excellent total load capacity up to 44 lb

NOT JUST A SIMPLE CUBE: The spacious compartment offers extra storage for your book collection, while the table top is perfect for your glasses, a cup of water, and a lamp; stack a second one of these side tables on top of this one to get more shelves
TOOLS INCLUDED FOR ASSEMBLY: Some assembly is required to set up this end table, but there's no need to worry. It comes with numbered parts, illustrated instructions, and an Allen key

DECORATIVELY VERSATILE PIECE: Our end table is a popular pick among decorators & designers because it can be displayed in any room. Use it as a coffee table in the living room or a side table in a reception room

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,157 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
